review: I give the Fire TV Stick 5 stars.  First of all the price is very reasonable.  It is super easy to install.  Once installed it is also very easy to operate.  I love the fact that I no longer have to watch movies just on my Kindle.  I also like the feature that allows you to jump from one device to another.  This is very handy for browsing on a hand-held device and then switching to the big screen when you are ready to watch.  If you are already a Prime Member there is no limit to the number of TV shows, Movies or Music to pick from.  If you are not, with the free 2 day shipping that comes with Prime, it is well worth the $99.00 per year fee.  I have satellite TV also.  I have not watched it since receiving my Fire TV Stick two weeks ago. I guess you can sum it up this way, I LOVE IT !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
author: Brenda R. Hall

review: I've only had the Fire Stick a few days, but I like the viewing potential. I did, however, accidentally purchase a movie without meaning to! Amazon was kind enough to refund and remove the movie for me. I also found out how to enable a password in order to make purchases - no more accidental charges!
